mapper.update: update dormitory set available = available + 1 where id = #{id}
update dormitory set available = available - 1 where id = #{id}
update student set dormitory_id = #{dormitoryId} where id = #{studentId}
update dormitory set name = #{name},telephone = #{telephone} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,name from dormitory where available > 0;
select student_id from student where dormitory_id = #{dormitoryId};
select id from dormitory where available > 0

select d.id id,d.name name,d.type type,d.available available,d.telephone telephone,b.name buildingName,d.building_id buildingId from dormitory d,building b where d.building_id = b.id and d.name like concat('%',#{value},'%');

select d.id id,d.name name,d.type type,d.available available,d.telephone telephone,b.name buildingName,d.building_id buildingId from dormitory d,building b where d.building_id = b.id and d.telephone like concat('%',#{value},'%');
select id,name from dormitory where building_id = #{buildingId}
